item.title: Apple may be considering high refresh rate screens for all iPhone 17 series models - The Indian Express
item.description:
Apple May Introduce High Refresh Rate Displays in All iPhone 17 Models

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Indian Express

Apple, known for its premium smartphones, may change its strategy regarding display technology. Recent leaks suggest that high-refresh-rate displays could be available in all iPhone 17 models, a shift from the previous exclusivity to Pro variants.

  • High-refresh-rate “ProMotion” displays may be introduced in the iPhone 17 series.
  • Possible use of LTPO panels across all models, enhancing display capabilities compared to LTPS panels currently used.
  • Support for always-on display features will be available.
  • The entire series may feature a new anti-reflective, scratch-resistant display.
  • Introduction of a new model rumored to replace the iPhone 17 Plus, possibly named “Slim” or “Air”.
“The non-Pro models in the iPhone 15 and iPhone 16 series use LTPS panels, which have a maximum refresh rate of just 60Hz.”

This update could significantly enhance user experience across the iPhone 17 lineup, as consumers may benefit from improved display technologies previously limited to higher-end models.

item.title: Following listing, beer maker Kati Patang plans to acquire and incubate small alcohol businesses to expand | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Kati Patang Expands with Plans to Acquire Small Alcohol Businesses

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Mint

Kati Patang Lifestyle, a craft beer maker, aims to expand its operations by acquiring and incubating small alcohol businesses as it recently went public through a share swap.

  • The company will grow both organically and inorganically over the next two years.
  • Its recent acquisition includes a stake in a UK brewery.
  • Kati Patang seeks to foster expansion while developing its own brands.
“We are looking to acquire and incubate domestic and international brands,” said co-founder Shantanu Upadhyay.

Kati Patang's strategy indicates a focused approach on scaling operations in the competitive alcohol market.

item.title: Anant Ambani's fitness trainer, Vinod Channa, shares 3 ways to reduce belly fat - India.com
item.description:
Anant Ambani's fitness trainer, Vinod Channa, shares 3 ways to reduce belly fat

Published Date: N/A Source: India.com

Vinod Channa, the fitness trainer who assisted Anant Ambani in his notable weight loss journey, provides three key strategies to effectively reduce belly fat.

How to Reduce Belly Fat in 3 Steps?

  1. Eat at regular intervals: Channa emphasizes the importance of regular eating to keep metabolism active without stressing the intestinal system.
  2. Work on abs at the right time: The optimal time for abs workouts is after larger muscle exercises to maximize calorie burn.
  3. Work on all muscle groups: Target all major abdominal muscles for comprehensive results.

Channa also stresses that each individual's weight loss journey is unique and tailored nutrition plans are essential.

About Vinod Channa

Vinod Channa is a highly sought-after celebrity fitness trainer known for his holistic approach to fitness and nutrition.

item.title: Apple iPhone 17 to launch in 2025 with major upgrades, never seen before! - India TV News
item.description:
Apple iPhone 17 to launch in 2025 with major upgrades, never seen before!

Publication Date: January 1, 2025

Source: India TV News

Apple is gearing up to launch its iPhone 17 series in 2025, promising major upgrades that fans have long anticipated.

  • All models will feature Pro Motion OLED displays with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • The iPhone 17 series is rumored to include a 48MP rear camera with advanced AI features.
  • It will be powered by the A19 Bionic chipset with an impressive 12GB of RAM.
  • Potential introduction of the thinnest iPhone dubbed the 'iPhone 17 Air' or 'iPhone 17 Slim'.
“With upgrades in display, camera, and hardware, the iPhone 17 series is poised to set new benchmarks in smartphone technology.”

This upcoming series could redefine the smartphone experience with its innovative features and design.

item.title: Poco X7 5G Series Launch Date Confirmed: Check Out Specifications - ABP Live
item.description:
Poco X7 5G Series Launch Date Confirmed: Check Out Specifications

Publication Date: January 2, 2025 Source: Poco Official Announcement

The Poco X7 5G series, including the X7 and X7 Pro models, is set to launch on January 9 in India, with availability through Flipkart. Details about the design and specifications have been revealed prior to the launch.

  • Launch Date: January 9, 2025
  • Models: Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G
  • Purchase Platform: Flipkart
  • Design: Distinct styles with colors like black, yellow, silver, and green
  • Processor: X7 Pro will feature MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra; base model to have Dimensity 7300-Ultra
  • Camera: Expected 50-megapixel main camera; Pro may get Sony IMX882 sensor
  • Display: 6.67-inch AMOLED with high resolution and refresh rate
  • Battery: X7 5G will have 5,110mAh; the Pro variant features a 6,000mAh battery
“With an array of powerful features and striking designs, the Poco X7 5G series is poised to capture attention when it launches early this year.”

In conclusion, the Poco X7 series is highly anticipated due to its innovative features and design, aiming to draw significant interest upon release.

item.title: Flipkart 'Big Bachat Days' sale: Deals and offers on iPhones, Pixels, more - Business Standard
item.description:
Flipkart 'Big Bachat Days' sale: Deals and offers on iPhones, Pixels, more

Date: Jan 01 2025 | Source: Business Standard

E-commerce platform Flipkart is offering significant discounts on various smartphones as part of its "Big Bachat Days" sale from January 1 to January 5.

  • Offers include cashback, UPI discounts, and no-interest EMI options.
  • Apple's iPhone 16 series models available with discounts up to Rs 7000.
  • Google Pixel 9 series smartphones can have bank discounts of up to Rs 10,000.
  • Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 maximizes savings with discounts of Rs 12,500 with select banks.
"Customers can avail a discount of Rs 2000 on UPI transactions for purchasing an iPhone 16 series model."

The sale promises extensive offers across popular smartphone brands, ensuring customers receive excellent value for their purchases.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes, January 1, 2025 edition: Claim your exclusive New Year 2025 freebies now - The Financial Express
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes, January 1, 2025 edition: Claim your exclusive New Year 2025 freebies now

Publication Date: January 1, 2025

Source: Financial Express

Garena Free Fire MAX has emerged as a popular battle royale game, offering daily redeem codes that enhance gameplay with exclusive rewards. Players must act fast to secure their codes, which are time-sensitive and only valid for 24 hours.

Key Points:

  • Redeem codes provide free in-game rewards like skins and weapons.
  • Each code is valid for only 24 hours and must be claimed quickly.
  • Redeeming codes is simple via the official rewards site.
  • Free Fire MAX competes with other games like PUBG Mobile and BGMI.
“Redeem codes let you level up your gameplay without spending real money.”

The focus on redeem codes highlights the game's evolving landscape and engagement with its community, making it a key feature for players.

item.title: Redmi Note 14 Pro+ review: Some hits and a few big misses | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Redmi Note 14 Pro+ Review: Some Hits and a Few Big Misses

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Mint

The Redmi Note 14 series returns with significant updates, striving to build on its legacy in a competitive market with improvements in cameras and performance, yet falls short in software updates.

  • The Redmi Note series is a key product for Xiaomi in India.
  • Redmi Note 14 Pro+ features HyperOS 1 based on Android 14, which will become outdated soon.
  • The smartphone will only receive two major Android updates, which is disappointing for consumers.
“That’s a big disappointment.”

The Redmi Note 14 Pro+ intends to attract a new generation of consumers but has notable software limitations that could affect its longevity.

item.title: Mswipe bets big on international expansion | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Mswipe bets big on international expansion

Publication Date: 31 December 2023

Source: Mint

Mswipe, a payments fintech backed by Alpha Wave Global, is set to expand its operations into regions like the UK, Malaysia, and Nepal to leverage higher margins. This follows a recent successful entry into the UAE and Singapore.

  • Mswipe is focusing on international expansion after a year of marginal revenue growth.
  • The plan includes entering markets such as the UK, Malaysia, and Nepal within the next six months.
  • The company aims to improve its profit margins through this strategic expansion.
“We are targeting high-margin markets to boost our growth,” said co-founder and CEO Ketan Patel.

This expansion reflects Mswipe's efforts to adapt its business strategy and improve financial outcomes amid market fluctuations.

item.title: OnePlus 13R launching in India on January 7: Price, design, specs and everything expected | Mint - Mint
item.description:
OnePlus 13R launching in India on January 7: Price, design, specs and everything expected

Publication Date: N/A Source: Live Mint

OnePlus is set to unveil its flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 13R, at an event on January 7, alongside the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus Watch 3. This device is projected to be a key competitor in the premium mid-range segment for 2025.

OnePlus 13R expected specifications:

  • 6.78-inch 8T LTPO AMOLED display with 4,500 nits peak brightness.
  • Powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor with Adreno 750 GPU.
  • Support for up to 16GB of LPDDR5X RAM and 1TB of UFS 4.0 storage.
  • Triple camera setup with 50MP primary sensor, likely including a telephoto lens.
  • 16MP front camera.
  • IP65 rating for dust and splash resistance.
  • Expected to run OxygenOS 15 on Android 15.

In China, pricing starts at 3399 yuan for 12GB RAM/256GB storage model. Possible Indian price around ₹40,000 is still to be confirmed at the launch.

item.title: OnePlus 13R now rumored to sport a dedicated telephoto camera - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
item.description:
OnePlus 13R Rumored to Feature Dedicated Telephoto Camera

Publication Date: January 1, 2024

Source: technews.com

The OnePlus 13R, set to be officially unveiled on January 7, is rumored to have a dedicated telephoto camera, differing from its counterpart, the OnePlus Ace 5.

  • Official launch scheduled for January 7 during the OnePlus 13 global event.
  • Rumors suggest a telephoto camera on the OnePlus 13R, unlike the Ace 5.
  • Camera specs: 50MP main, 8MP ultrawide, 50MP telephoto (2x), and 16MP selfie camera.
  • Different battery capacity compared to the Ace 5.
“OnePlus 13R camera info: Rear: - 50MP LYT-700 (main) - 8MP Ultrawide - 50MP JN5 (2X Telephoto) Selfie: 16MP” — Yogesh Brar (@heyitsyogesh)

If these rumors are accurate, the OnePlus 13R would surpass the OnePlus Ace 5 in terms of camera quality while compromising on battery size.

item.title: OnePlus 13 launch: India-specific Project Starlight, AI features, upgrades and more coming on January 7 - HT Tech
item.description:
OnePlus 13 launch: India-specific Project Starlight, AI features, upgrades and more coming on January 7

Date: January 7, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Introduction

The OnePlus 13 is set for its global launch on January 7, 2025, featuring exclusive India-specific initiatives like a lifetime display warranty and new AI features.

Key Points

  • Launch date confirmed for January 7, 2025, including the OnePlus 13R.
  • Industry-first lifetime display warranty addressing green line display issues.
  • Project Starlight focuses on solving smartphone-related problems for Indian users.
  • Introduction of the world's first DisplayMate A++ display with LTPO 4.1 and Aqua Touch 2.0 technology.
  • New AI-powered features, including AI Detail Boost and AI Reflection Eraser, powered by Google Gemini.

Notable Quotes or Statistics

"We expect significant upgrades and better support for future problems and repairs."

Conclusion

The OnePlus 13 aims to enhance user experience in India with innovative features and robust support plans, setting a new standard in smartphone offerings.

item.title: Slimmer designs, AI-powered user experiences to repairable devices, 5 trends that will shape smartphones in 2025 - The Indian Express
item.description:
5 Trends Shaping Smartphones in 2025: Slim Designs, AI Integration, and More

Publication Date: 2024-12-05 Source: Indian Express

The article discusses the upcoming trends that are expected to influence the smartphone market in 2025, despite perceived stagnation in the industry. Key trends include the introduction of slimmer designs, enhanced AI features, improved security measures, and a focus on repairability.

  • Smartphones may have slimmer designs, with companies like Apple and Samsung introducing new models.
  • Greater integration of AI features to create personalized user experiences.
  • Enhanced security measures to protect against increasing cyber threats.
  • New software features to help curb smartphone addiction.
  • A push towards more repairable technology.
“As the market shifts toward premium phones, brands face mounting pressure to enhance the smartphone experience.”

Overall, the smartphone landscape is predicted to evolve with these trends while maintaining core functionalities.

item.title: Is the MCX stock set for a rally? | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Is the MCX Stock Set for a Rally?

Publication Date: November 20, 2023 Source: Live Mint

With technology upgrades and the launch of a new platform in 2023, followed by the introduction of new products, the Multi Commodity Exchange of India Ltd. (MCX) solidifies its position as the leading commodity derivatives exchange in India.

  • Catering to over 90% of India’s commodity derivative trades.
  • Facilitates price discovery and provides price risk management tools.
  • Established in 2003 under SEBI’s regulatory framework.
“The introduction of new products will significantly impact MCX's operations.”

This development signals a promising future for MCX, especially with its expanding role in India’s commodity trading landscape.

item.title: Today's Quordle Answers and Hints for January 01, 2025 - Sportskeeda
item.description:
Today's Quordle Answers and Hints for January 01, 2025

Date: January 01, 2025

Source: Sportskeeda

Quordle Answers (January 01, 2025): Struggling to solve today's Quordle? No worries. We have today's Quordle hints and answers for you to solve it on your own!

If you're a fan of word puzzles, you probably already know that Quordle is a more challenging version of Wordle. Instead of guessing just one word, Quordle requires you to guess four five-letter words simultaneously within nine attempts.

Key Points:

  • Today's Quordle answers: CLING, SUITE, WORRY, TONIC.
  • Quordle Chill answers: SLATE, USAGE, COMIC, WHINE.
  • Quordle Extreme answers: BRUTE, PHONY, TIMID, TWIRL.
  • Quordle Sequence answers: STALK, CHAIN, ADULT, BOARD.
WARNING: Spoilers ahead! Only read on if you want to know today's Quordle answers.

And that's a wrap! That's all the Quordle answers for the day.

item.title: The 7 tech gadgets I couldn't live without in 2024 - and they don't include AirTags - ZDNet
item.description:
The 7 tech gadgets I couldn't live without in 2024 - and they don't include AirTags

Publication Date: September 3, 2024 | Source: ZDNET

The author shares their top 7 tech gadgets that have become essential for daily use in 2024, deliberately excluding any Apple products.

  • Klarus K5 waterproof power bank
  • DJI Mini 4 Pro drone
  • InCharge XS 4-in-1 keychain charge cable
  • Bluetti AC60P power station
  • InfiRay P2 Pro thermal camera
  • Apricorn Aegis Secure Key 3.0 encrypted flash drive
  • 240W magnetic breakaway USB-C connectors
“The real test for any product is whether it can make the shift from something I reviewed into something that I use long-term.”

These gadgets are not only functional but have proven their durability and utility in various situations, making them worthy of recommendation for everyday users.

item.title: Chrome Browser Extension Hacked, Your Data And Passwords Could Be Exposed - News18
item.description:
Chrome Browser Extension Hacked: Exposing User Data and Passwords

Date: December 31, 2024

Source: News18

Chrome users are alarmed by a large-scale hacking incident affecting extensions, putting millions of users' data and security authenticity at risk. The issue was first reported by cybersecurity firm Cyberhaven, which fell victim to a phishing attack.

Key Points:

  • The hacking incident potentially exposes user data and passwords.
  • Phishing tactics allowed hackers to gain access to extensions.
  • Users are advised to avoid unknown links and consider using password managers.
  • The incident underscores the importance of security for Chrome extensions.
“The cyberattack on extensions have been organised with the help of phishing.”

Users are urged to be vigilant and protect their accounts in light of this significant security breach.

item.title: Flipkart year-end sale: Grab iPhone 15 for ₹58,999 and iPhone 16 at … All details | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Flipkart Year-End Sale Offers Discounts on iPhones and More

Date: December 2024 Source: Live Mint

As 2024 comes to a close, Flipkart is offering significant discounts on various premium and budget smartphones during its "Mobiles Year-End" sale.

  • The iPhone 15 is now available for ₹58,999, down from ₹79,999 for the green variant, marking a saving of ₹21,000.
  • The iPhone 16 is priced at ₹74,900, with an additional ₹4,000 off for select bank card users.
  • Samsung's Galaxy S24 Plus has a discount bringing its price down to ₹64,999 from ₹99,999.
  • Motorola's Edge 50 Pro is available for ₹27,999, while the Moto G85 is listed at ₹17,999.
  • Other deals include the Nothing Phone (2a) for ₹22,499 and discounts on Vivo T3 Lite and Poco C61.
“This is an opportune moment for tech enthusiasts to grab their desired devices at competitive rates.”

The sale presents a great opportunity for shoppers to take advantage of reduced prices on some of the latest smartphones.
